genius.gui.panels

Class IntegerToBoundeRangeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.gui.panels.IntegerToBoundeRangeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.BoundedRangeModel

    public class IntegerToBoundeRangeAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.BoundedRangeModel
    Adapts IntegerModel to BoundedRangeModel so that we can use it for sliders.
